app_descript:
When Will I Die - Prank Quiz

Discover the lighter side of life and have a bit of fun with your friends using When Will I Die - Prank Quiz! This entertaining app uses a unique algorithm to estimate your death date based on various lifestyle and habit questions. Whether you're looking to prank your friends or just curious about what the app calculates, it's a light-hearted take on a serious subject.
